title: Scientific Argumentation Design Workshop for Professional Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental argumentation structures and possession of practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Focuses on applying scientific reasoning to practical situations for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify core elements of scientific argumentation (claim, evidence, rebuttal) through interactions with peers.
Learners can design an argumentation framework reflecting competitive perspectives through case-based discussions.
Learners can systematically document the argumentation process and provide feedback using digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
